sentences.cn: …他作为大提琴家的艺术技艺。

sentences.en: Advanced Artistry moisturisers restore moisture and leave your skinfeeling soft and smooth.

sentences.en: Certainly, Chaplin's artistry was unparalleled, so whatever his motivation, we are thankful.
sentences.cn: 当然, 查理艺术成就那么卓越, 不管本意是什么, 我们都心存感激.

sentences.en: He played the piece with effortless artistry.
sentences.cn: 他游刃有余地演奏了这首乐曲。

sentences.en: He rendered the landscapes of the Netherlands with great skill and artistry.
sentences.cn: 他以高度技巧和艺术才能描绘了荷兰的风景.

sentences.en: John McEnroe beat Jimmy Connors with the most complete display of artistry the game had ever seen.
sentences.cn: 约翰·麦肯罗将球技发挥得淋漓尽致，从而击败了吉米·康纳斯，这在比赛中前所未见。

sentences.en: Large - format photography is a combination of high - level techniques and artistry.
sentences.cn: 大画幅摄影是技术性和艺术性极强的摄影门类.

sentences.en: Scarlett exercised the same charms as Melanie but with a studied artistry and consummate skill.
sentences.cn: 思嘉也像媚兰那样发挥自己魅力的作用,但是她还使用了一种很有修养的功夫和高度的技巧.

sentences.en: Tea processing requires both technique and artistry.
sentences.cn: 茶叶加工对工艺和技巧都有要求。

sentences.en: The aesthetic principles of aesthetic consciousness are person - oriented , harmonious, zoology - centered, artistry ambit.
sentences.cn: 审美意识指向的审美原则是:天人合一、人为中心原则, 和谐原则, 生态中心转向, “庖丁解牛”的高远艺术境界.

sentences.en: There is artistry in what he does.
sentences.cn: 他做的一切都具有艺术性。

sentences.en: They are marks and necessary conditions for nursing to evolove into artistry.
sentences.cn: 它们是护理进入艺术化的标志,也是其成为艺术应具备的条件.

sentences.en: This group of brilliant paintings reaches the climax of the painter's artistry.
sentences.cn: 这批精彩的画达到了这位画家绘画艺术技巧的顶峰.

sentences.en: Thus the inanimate pop music zone feels the new elegance and artistry.
sentences.cn: 死气沉沉的乐坛,因而萌生了新的风雅.

sentences.en: We have to take into consideration the parameter of practicality and artistry.
sentences.cn: 我们应该将艺术性和实用性等因素都考虑在内.

sentences.en: Works with the full foot jade expected, the performance superb artistry.
